# delemr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package contains a collection of functions that I have developed for various purposes in my work. This package contains a collection of functions that I have developed for various purposes in the course of my work. These functions are not necessarily related to each other, they only have in common that they have been useful to me at some point.

If one of those caught your eye, you can install delemr like so:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("m-delem/delemr")
```
